def is_sink_clean_sink(sink:item):
    # Function to check if a sink is clean
    symbol sink_clean = clean(sink) and not has_water(sink)
    return sink_clean

behavior clean_fish_in_sink(fish:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(fish, sink)
        wash(fish)
        # Wash the fish by hand in the sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind fish: item where:
            is_food_fish(fish)
        # Select fish to wash
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and is_sink_clean_sink(sink):
            # If a clean sink is found, proceed with washing the fish
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and is_sink_clean_sink(sink)
            clean_fish_in_sink(fish, sink)

        else:
            # Check all sinks in the scene that have not been visited
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink,"Check is the sink clean and available")
                    # Observe whether the sink is clean and available
